profile.title: Iphrofayela yomsebenzisi
profile.mustLogin: Kufanele ungene ngemvume ukuze ubuke izilungiselelo.
profile.noPrivateKey: Ayikho ukhiye oyimfihlo kulena divayisi ongayikhipha.
profile.importFailed: Kwehlulekile ukungenisa ukhiye (iphasiwedi ayilungile noma ifayela lonakele).
profile.keysRotated: Kubunjwe umbhangqwana omusha wokhiye futhi ukhiye womphakathi ulayishiwe.
profile.keyDisclaimer: Ukhiye wakho oyimfihlo awusoze washiya le divayisi. Khipha ikhophi evikelwe ngephasiwedi ukuze uyibuyisele kwenye idivayisi.
profile.themeFreeNotice: Usebenzisa uMkhawulo wama-Free — sebenzisa izinketho ezisheshayo ze-Sun/-Moon ngezansi. Thuthukisa ukuze uvule amanye amatimu.
profile.backupDesc: Dala izipele ezivikelwe ngephasiwedi zokhiye bakho, bese ubuyisela kwenye idivayisi ukuze uhumushe futhi uvumelanise.
profile.followHint: Izindaba zabo zizovela ekudleni kwakho okuthi Ulandelayo uma bepoda nge-Followers (noma uMphakathi).
profile.callTextForwardingDescription: Dlulisa izingcingo nemiyalezo engenayo kufoni noma ku-imeyili eqinisekisiwe. Okuphumayo kungakhombisa inombolo yakho ye-Chatforia.

chat.selectPrompt: Khetha umbhalo noma ikamelo lengxoxo ukuze uqale ukuxoxa

status.filesNote: Kuze kufike kumafayela ama-5. Kuphela ngemva kwamahora angama-24 ngokuzenzakalela.

auth.headline: Imiyalezo evikelekile, yomhlaba wonke enokuhumusha okushesha
auth.description: Ukubethelwa kokuphelela-ekupheleni, ukuhumusha okusekelwa yi-AI, imiyalezo enyamalalayo, nokushaya/izingcingo zevidiyo.

feature.privacy: Ubumfihlo kuqala. Idatha yakho, ulawulo lwakho.

auth.desktopTip: Ekudeskithophini? Skene ngefoni yakho ukuze uthole uhlelo.
auth.subhead: Imiyalezo eyimfihlo, ebethelwe, futhi ehumushwe — ngokushesha.
auth.tip: Ungasebenzisa i-Chatforia kunoma iyiphi idivayisi — noma ulande uhlelo ukuze uthole okungcono.
auth.scanHint: Skene ukuze ulande uhlelo noma uvule ebhrawuza.

press.title: Abasakazi Bezindaba
press.boilerplateText: I-Chatforia iyimlayezo evikelekile enokuhumusha ngokushesha kanye nokubethelwa kwe-E2E, eyenzelwe ukwenza izingxoxo zomhlaba wonke zibe yimfihlo futhi zibe lula.

careers.title: Imisebenzi
careers.intro: Siyiqembu elincane elakha umyalezo womhlaba wonke, oyimfihlo. Uma unakekela ukubethelwa, ukufinyeleleka, no-UX omnandi, singathanda ukuzwa kuwe.
careers.openRoles: Izikhundla ezivuliwe: Ubunjiniyela (Full-stack, iOS, Android), Umkhiqizo, Ukusekela.

about.title: Mayelana ne-Chatforia
about.description: I-Chatforia iwumyalezo ovikelekile, onolimi oluningi onokubethelwa kokuphelela-ekupheleni, ukuhumusha ngokushesha, kanye nokushaya/izingcingo zevidiyo. Umgomo wethu ulula: ukusiza abantu baxhumane — ngokuphepha, ngokuyimfihlo, futhi beqiwa izilimi.

values.access: Ukufinyelela kubo bonke: Ukuhumusha okuzenzakalelayo izilimi eziyi-100+.

about.howDescription: Imiyalezo ibethelwa kudivayisi yakho ngaphambi kokuba ishiye. Ukuhumusha, izipele, nokuvumelanisa amadivayisi kwakhelwe ukunciphisa lokho okungabonwa amaseva ethu.

advertise.title: Khangisa nge-Chatforia
advertise.description: Finyelela abasebenzisi bemiyalezo abazinikele ngezikhala ezinhle, eziphephile kumkhiqizo. Sinikeza izikhangiso ze-banner ezibonakala kalula, ubudlelwano bokuxhasa, nezikhangiso zethu. Ababhalisile be-Premium abababoni izikhangiso.

adsense.withPubId: Okwamanje sikhangisa nge-Google AdSense. Uma ufuna ukusihlosisa nge-Google Ads, sebenzisa i-publisher ID {{pubId}} bese ucela managed placement kumayunithi ethu angezansi. Kunokuxhaswa okuqondile — sebenzisa ifomu.
adsense.noPubId: Okwamanje sikhangisa nge-Google AdSense. Kukhona nokuxhaswa okuqondile — sebenzisa ifomu elingezansi.

advertise.noPlacements: Awekho ama-placement amisiwe okwamanje. Wanezele ku-ads/placements.js.

why.highSession: Imvamisa ephezulu yokuvakashela nesikhathi eside sokuhlala ku-UI yengxoxo
why.brandSafe: Ifomethi ephephile kumkhiqizo; ukunciphisa imvamisa okunesizotha
why.deals: Izivumelwano eziqondile noma nge-programmatic nge-AdSense/Google Ads

form.submittedMsg: Siyabonga! Uphenyo lwakho seluthunyelwe. Sizobuyisa maduze.
form.mailtoInfo: Kuvulwa uhlelo lwe-imeyili yakho ukuze uthumele uphenyo…

upgrade.title: Thuthukisa
upgrade.subtitle: Vula uhlelo olufanele: susa izikhangiso nge-Plus, noma uthole izici zamandla ezigcwele nge-Premium.

gettingStarted.title: Ukuqalisa
gettingStarted.subtitle: Umuva ku-Chatforia? Lo mhlahlandlela omfishane ukhombisa okubalulekile ukuze uqale emaminithini ambalwa.

alert.text: Lo mhlahlandlela uzokhula njengoba sithula izici ezintsha. Uma kukhona okushodayo, sazise nge-

section2.title: 2) Qala ukuxoxa
section2.item1: Dala i-DM noma Iqembu bese uthumela umyalezo wakho wokuqala.
section2.item2: Sebenzisa ukuhumusha okusheshayo ukuze uxoxe ngezilimi eziyi-100+.
section2.item3: Zama imiyalezo enyamalalayo nezinqinisekiso zokufundwa ku-Iphrofayela → Ubumfihlo.

section3.title: 3) Yiya phambili
section3.item2Part1: Xhumanisa amadivayisi angeziwe futhi usethe izipele ezibethelwe ku-

account.q: Ngingayidala noma ngiyibuyisele kanjani i-akhawunti yami?
account.a: Landa uhlelo noma sebenzisa iwebhu, cindezela “Dala i-akhawunti”, uqinisekise i-imeyili/ifoni. Ukuvuselela, sebenzisa “Ukhohlwe iphasiwedi”.

privacy.a: Yebo. Imiyalezo nezingcingo zibethelwe kokuphelela-ekupheleni ngokuzenzakalelayo. Wena nomamukeli kuphela eningakwazi ukuyifunda.

translate.a: Nika amandla “Humusha ngokuzenzakalelayo” ku-Izilungiselelo → Ukubukeka & Ulimi. Sihumusha kudivayisi lapho kuxhaswa, kungenjalo nge-API eziphephile nge-metadata encane.

contact.a: Sithinte ku-support@chatforia.com. Faka izithombe-sikrini nenguqulo yohlelo lwakho.

intro.body: Le Nqubomgomo Yobumfihlo ichaza ukuthi i-Chatforia (“thina”, “thina”) iqoqe kanjani, isebenzise futhi yabelane ngolwazi uma usebenzisa izinhlelo namasevisi ethu. Siklama i-Chatforia ukuze sinciphise idatha esingayibona.

infoWeCollect.title: Ulwazi esiluqoqayo
infoWeCollect.account: Ulwazi lwe-akhawunti (isb., i-imeyili/ifoni) ukuze sakhe futhi sivikele i-akhawunti yakho.
infoWeCollect.encrypted: Okuqukethwe okubethelwe (imiyalezo/izingcingo) kubethelwe kokuphelela-ekupheleni; asikwazi ukukufunda.
infoWeCollect.diagnostics: Imininingwane yokuhlola/ukusetshenziswa njengamaphutha, uhlobo lwedivayisi, noma i-analytics elula yokuthuthukisa ukusebenza.

sharing.title: Ukuhlanganyela
sharing.body: Asithengisi idatha yomuntu siqu. Singase sabelane ngeminye imininingwane nabacubunguli (isb., izixwayiso zokuphusha, i-analytics) ngaphansi kwezinkontileka eziqinile.

rights.title: Amalungelo akho
rights.body: Ngokwesifunda sakho (isb., i-GDPR/UK GDPR/CPRA), ungacela ukufinyelela, ukulungisa, ukususwa, noma ukuphuma kwezinye izinqubo. Xhumana: privacy@chatforia.com.

retention.title: Ukugcinwa kwedatha & ukuphepha
retention.body: Sigcina kuphela okudingekayo ukuze sisebenze insiza futhi sisebenzisa ukuphepha okujwayelekile embonini. Okuqukethwe kwe-E2E asikwazi ukukuqaqa.

children.title: Izingane
children.body: I-Chatforia ayihloselwe izingane ezingaphansi kweminyaka engu-13 (noma njengoba kudingwa umthetho wendawo yakho).

changes.title: Izinguquko
changes.body: Sizobeka izibuyekezo lapha futhi siguqule usuku “Lokuvuselelwa kokugcina”.

intro.body: Ngokusebenzisa i-Chatforia uyavuma le Migomo. Uma ungavumi, ungayisebenzisi insiza.

accounts.title: Ama-akhawunti
accounts.itemAccurateInfo: Nikeza imininingwane enembile futhi ugcine izifakelo ziphephile.
accounts.itemResponsibility: Uphend responsible ngomsebenzi owenziwa nge-akhawunti yakho.

acceptableUse.title: Ukusetshenziswa okwamukelekayo
acceptableUse.itemNoAbuse: Akukho okuqukethwe okungekho emthethweni, okudlame, noma okwephula amalungelo; akukho ugaxekile noma ukusetshenziswa okuzenzakalelayo okubi.

yourContent.title: Okuqukethwe kwakho
yourContent.body: Ugcine amalungelo okuqukethwe kwakho. Usinika amalungelo adingekayo ukuze sisebenze insiza (isb., ukudlulisa, ukugcina, ukuhumusha).

disclaimer.title: Izimangalo & umthwalo wemfanelo
disclaimer.body: Insiza inikezwa “njengoba injalo” ngaphandle kweziqinisekiso. Ngokwezinga elivunyelwe ngumthetho, i-Chatforia ayibophezeli emonakalweni ongatheni noma olandelanayo.

changes.title: Izinguquko
changes.body: Singavuselela le migomo; ukuqhubeka nokusebenzisa ngemva kwezinguquko kusho ukwamukela.

doNotSell.title: Ungathengisi noma Wabelane Ngemininingwane Yami
doNotSell.body: I-Chatforia ayithengisi imininingwane yomuntu siqu. Abahlali base-California basengakwazi ukuthumela izicelo ngaphansi kwe-CPRA besebenzisa inkinobho engezansi.

cookies.title: Izilungiselelo Zamakhukhi
cookies.body: I-Chatforia isebenzisa amakhukhi ambalwa (isb., iseshini, ukuphepha). Asisebenzisi amakhukhi ezikhangiso zangaphandle. Phatha amakhukhi kuzilungiselelo zesiphequluli sakho.
